item.title: Hello
item.description: My name is Harper Reed. This website is hosted on IPFS. You can typically access it via harper.eth.link. I believe that web3 is part of our very weird future. I am not so sure on the details, but it is very exciting. About Harper Reed I am a computer operator who likes to make things. Also pranks. You can learn more about me at my website harperreed.com. Follow me on: Twitter Instagram My blog Feel free to reach out via Twitter or send me an email @ harper@modest.
